CustomField.description: The primary program enrollment for the student. Should be filled on hed__Program_Enrollment__c creation, and only updated if the enrollment is complete & a new enrollment is added.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The primary program enrollment for the student. Should be filled on hed__Program_Enrollment__c creation, and only updated if the enrollment is complete & a new enrollment is added.
CustomField.label: Primary Academic Program
